name: gatsby-resume
description: A personalized resume website that built with gatsby.||I was inspired by a senior programmer's resume to build this project and I have refers so many resume websites yet 'only' his resume is clean and good looking. So it is awkward that my website layout and colour scheme is so similar to him, making me introspect and struggling about rights on law and moral and difference of reference and plagarism. I think it is time to figure out and develop my personal design style for commercial use. ||This project is completed under the helps of another senior web developer, he makes me fully understand the quote |  'If I can see higher, it is because I stand on the shoulders of giants.  '| I used to keep self-study since I am not familiar with any programmer before I know him and I thought I am good enough to solve the problems even thought it usually takes long time to solve the problems. Thus, luckily that he could guide me in this probject, shorten the development time and optimize the website. ||I learned a lot from both of him, such as retrieve of array of object, deployment, lodash and styling frameworks. I do not think that I can know these and compelete this project if I solo this project. |I asked him about the idea of resume website. He recommanded me to use the gatsby (react framework), although it has a lot advanced usage yet it simplifies the routing so it would be enough.|Another impressing point is he still could give the clear answer even my questios are confusing and misleading that I even not sure what I have asked. From this, I found that anxiety causes my thinking messy, spend hours to figure out the solution until I ask for helps. To avoid the situation, I think it is good to take a shower first or place a doll and tell it the problems, sometimes they works.||Through this projects, I can feel that my skills are improved dramatically.

name: MYR-Currency

images.caption: To calculate the exchange rate instantly

description: A website to calculate live currency and foreign exchange rates that prioritize Malaysia Ringgit.||Although there are many improvement and features should be implemented, yet after I start the project and designed the UI, I found that there are only limited of related API with restrictions under free account.|Thus, I think it is pointless to develop this website so I closed this project.

name: Infographic Design

images.caption: Kerajaan Melaka Sistem Pembesar Empat Lipatan

description: Some infographics I created during study period.||They are created for the general study course assignments.|Although it is group assignment, yet I always responsible for whole design and summerize content.

name: Timetable Management System

images.caption: View, edit and delete the timetable of courses
Show the details of timetable based on course and semester in complete version
Show the details of timetable based on course and semester in simplified version
Pop colour plate and drop course button when click on the course

description: A timetable Management System for Courses, University and Colleague.||Features:|1. Login system with RECAPTCHA|2. Backend management system |3. Complete and simplified version of table |4. Export as pdf and excel |5. Recolour the table |6. Add drop course||Hosting:|hosting with XAMPP||This is my group final year project when I studying diploma at UNIMY.|At the time, my teammates and I have only basic understanding to the use of languages so luckily that even thought we dont have the concept of frameworks and just copy the codes from google and stackoverflow, yet the website still could run fluently and make the features as planned (except profile system).||After this project end, I backed up the codes yet it has too many copies and I could not ensure the uploaded to github one is the latest. It seems impossible to host no matter in local and online again since messy folder structure and I forgot to backup the DB and sql.

name: Cake Shop
description: A pure php website for online cake shop that hosting on XAMPP.||Created at my early days of diploma study for assignment. There are supposed to have more images yet I scare to host it XAMPP again so I just take the iamges from HTML.|Since it just a simple website, terrible folder stucture and large size images so just to show the UI, I kind of like this colour scheme.
